subject: Sleep
title: Sexsomnia Is Real
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Sexsomnia Is Real.

hook.text: A person initiates sexual activity while completely asleep and has no memory of it the next morning.

buildup.text: Sexsomnia is a recognized parasomnia where sexual behaviors occur during partial arousal from deep sleep.

discovery.text: Like sleepwalking, it happens during a confused state between deep sleep and wakefulness.

twist.text: It has appeared in legal cases worldwide. Courts must determine whether the person was truly unconscious.

climax.text: Treatment involves addressing triggers like stress, alcohol, and sleep deprivation, plus safety planning.

punchline.text: The brain can perform complex acts with nobody conscious at the wheel.

quiz.question: During which sleep state does sexsomnia occur?
